metadata.feature_description: Configure Publisher module settings including display options, social sharing, and behavior

steps.action: Navigate to News page and access Publisher Settings panel
steps.expected: Publisher Settings panel should open showing workflow dropdown
steps.actual: Publisher Settings panel opened with workflow dropdown showing 'Direct Publish' selected

steps.action: Click workflow dropdown and select 'Content Approval'
steps.expected: Workflow should change to Content Approval
steps.actual: Workflow dropdown expanded showing all available workflows, Content Approval selected successfully

steps.action: View social sharing checkboxes in Publisher Settings
steps.expected: Should see checkboxes for Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and RSS
steps.actual: All 5 social sharing checkboxes visible and initially checked (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, RSS)
RSS checkbox successfully unchecked, only Facebook, LinkedIn, and Pinterest remain checked

steps.action: Click Save button after modifying settings
steps.expected: Settings should be saved and panel should close
steps.actual: Save button clicked, settings saved successfully, panel closed automatically

steps.action: Reopen Publisher Settings panel after saving
steps.expected: Previously saved settings should be retained
steps.actual: Settings persisted correctly - Workflow shows 'Content Approval', Twitter and RSS remain unchecked, Facebook/LinkedIn/Pinterest remain checked

steps.expected: Dropdown should show valid workflow options
steps.actual: Dropdown shows 10 valid workflow options: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Approval Workflow, QA Test Workflow, Test <Special> & "Chars", Automated Test Workflow, NewWorkflow, Test Workflow Created, Auto Test 623696

observations: Code review revealed TopTagsPageSize and TopAuthorsPageSize settings exist in ModuleSettings.ascx with dropdown values (2, 3, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25), but these are accessed through standard DNN module settings interface (Module Actions > Settings) which requires hover interactions not easily testable

The suggested test scenarios 'Configure posts per page', 'Set default view mode (list/grid)', 'Set featured post count', and 'Reset to default settings' do not have corresponding UI elements in the Publisher Settings panel based on code review
Publisher module settings panel is accessible via a gear icon at the bottom of the Publisher module, not through Module Actions > Settings
Social sharing checkboxes default to enabled for Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest; RSS defaults to disabled based on code defaults
Settings are saved via AJAX API call to SettingsController.Save endpoint and persist correctly across page reloads
